mapper.select: select r.role_code role, group_concat(p.code) url from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join t_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join t_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join t_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where (u.username = #{username} or u.mobile=#{username}) and p.type='URL' group by r.role_code
select r.role_code from t_permission p left join t_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id left join t_role r on rp.role_id=r.id where p.code=#{url}
